thought: The download action (action_2) failed because the params for fileId were not set. The action requires the fileId in params to download the file. I will set the params correctly using the file id from input_data.
plan: Extract the file id from input_data.
Set params with fileId mode as 'id' and value as the file id.
Run the download action with the correct params.
Test the download action to ensure it returns the file content.
criticism: Currently, the download action has empty params, which causes failure. Properly setting the fileId param is necessary for successful download.

tool_input.comments: Download the file '00005_code.txt' from Google Drive using the fileId from input data
